description: Graduated from the Physics Department of Khachatur Abovian Armenian State Pedagogical University in 2018 with bachelor's and master's degrees. Since 2018, she has been working as a physics teacher at Khachatur Abovian Secondary School No. 1 in Abovyan.
A 10th-grade student at Abovyan Secondary School No. 1. Graduated from Abovyan Secondary School No. 7 and Zareh Music School, specializing in piano. Responsible for lottery design in the project.
Studied at V. Hambartsumyan Secondary School No. 10 in Abovyan. Attended an art school for 4-5 months and studied at Tumo for six months. 16 years old.
16 years old. Graduated from Abovyan Art School and studied at Abovyan Secondary School No. 10.
15 years old. Completed a graphic design course and is proficient in Figma, Illustrator, and Photoshop.
A 10th-grade student at Abovyan Secondary School No. 1. Graduated from Nikolay Vanyan School No. 5.
A student at Khachatur Abovian Secondary School No. 1 in Abovyan. Project manager and responsible for website development.

Studies at Abovyan Secondary School No. 1. Graduated from Abovyan Secondary School No. 10 and specializes in 3D modeling with Blender. Plays a managerial role in the project and is responsible for rocket production.
A student at Abovyan Secondary School No. 1. Graduated from Abovyan N. Vanyan School No. 5 and is proficient in Python programming. Responsible for presentation-related tasks in the project.
A student at Khachatur Abovian Secondary School No. 1. Graduated from Secondary School No. 2. Engages in sports and participates in international competitions.
